abstract: Paraguay defeats Brazil, 4-3, in shootout, to advance to semifinals of Copa America soccer tournament semifinals.
lead_paragraph: Paraguay defeated Brazil, 4-3, in a penalty shootout after a 1-1 draw to advance to the semifinals of the Copa América.

headline.main: Paraguay Stuns Brazil at Copa América

snippet: Paraguay defeated Brazil, 4-3, in a penalty shootout after a 1-1 draw to advance to the semifinals of the Copa América.
